mapper.insert: insert into LoginLog (logintime, ip, member_id, mac, state) values (#{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update LoginLog set logintime = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, logintime, ip, mac, state, e.id e_id,e.name e_name from LoginLog l join employee e on l.employee_id = e.id where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, logintime, ip, mac, state, e.id e_id,e.name e_name from LoginLog l join employee e on l.employee_id = e.id
